TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit FragmentState extends System.ValueType implements class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>
Public Structure FragmentState Implements IEquatable(Of FragmentState)

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> 获取实例<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>上<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>对象。
中的信息<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>通过分析修饰语音文本中合成语音标记语言 （） 所用的 SSML 输入到合成引擎的属性获取的。
A<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>对象也可能会出现指定的任何合成操作请求其<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>属性。 但是，其成员的含义可能会更改为不同的操作。 有关详细信息合成操作，请参阅<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>有关指定合成器操作的详细信息。
- 通过很大程度上处理规范和质量的语音输出的控件<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Prosody%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>，和 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A>
- 通过提供了拼音、 语言和位语言专家结构信息<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.LangId%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A>。

MemberSignature.Value: public FragmentState (System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction action, int langId, int emphasis, int duration, System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs sayAs, System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody prosody, char[] phonemes);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction action, int32 langId, int32 emphasis, int32 duration, class System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs sayAs, class System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody prosody, char[] phonemes) cil managed

public: FragmentState(System::Speech::Synthesis::TtsEngine::TtsEngineAction action, int langId, int emphasis, int duration, System::Speech::Synthesis::TtsEngine::SayAs ^ sayAs, System::Speech::Synthesis::TtsEngine::Prosody ^ prosody, cli::array <char> ^ phonemes);

new System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState : System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction * int * int * int * System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs * System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody * char[] -> System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState
MemberSignature.Usage: new System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState (action, langId, emphasis, duration, sayAs, prosody, phonemes)

Docs.param: A member of the enumeration that specifies a speech synthesis action.
The id of the language being used. Corresponds to the XML xml:lang attribute.
The emphasis to be applied to speech output or pauses.
The time allotted to speak the text of the .

A member of the class, indicating the type of text of the and the level of detail required for accurate rendering of the contained text. Corresponds to the <say-as> XML tag in the SSML specification The argument may be
A object indicating characteristics of the speech output such as pitch, speaking rate and volume. Corresponds to the <prosody> XML tag in the SSML specification

An array of objects providing the phonetic pronunciation for text contained in the , using the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA) specification. Corresponds to the <phoneme> XML tag in the SSML specification. This argument may be .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 通常情况下，应用程序执行不直接构造<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>对象。 相反，<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>实例由应用程序使用的成员创建<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>命名空间。
如果<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>指定值`action`自变量是<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>，通过提供的值`emphasis`自变量可以是：
- 如果为正数，若要暂停的毫秒的时间
- 如果负的成员<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>枚举
如果<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>指定值`action`参数不是<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>`emphasis`参数的类型必须为<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>。
如果值`duration`自变量和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody.Duration%2A>属性或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody>指定对象`prosody`参数上的不同，值<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody>使用对象。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Action As TtsEngineAction

Docs.summary: Returns the requested speech synthesizer action.
Docs.value: 的成员，用于指示 SSML 输入请求的语音合成操作。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Duration As Integer
public: property int Duration { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns the desired time for rendering a
Docs.value: 返回一个 ，它包含呈现 所需时间的以毫秒为单位的值。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Emphasis As Integer
public: property int Emphasis { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns instructions on how to emphasize a .
Docs.value: 返回一个 值，此值指示如何强调 。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 返回的值的解释<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>取决于<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>返回值<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>属性对当前<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>。
1. 如果值<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>是 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>
- 如果<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>为正，返回的值应被视为静默以毫秒为单位的长度。
- 如果<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>为负，则返回值应被视为属于<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>。
返回的强调信息<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>时属性<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>是<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>对应于的特性`<break>`SSML 输入到语音合成引擎的元素。
2. 对于所有其他值的<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>、<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>值应解释为<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>。
返回的强调信息<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>说对应于的特性`<emphasis>`SSML 输入到语音合成引擎的元素。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 返回的信息<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>属性对应于`<phoneme>`合成引擎的 SSML 输入的 XML 标记。
数组`char`返回的对象<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>属性表示使用国际音标 (IPA) 的发音。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Prosody As Prosody

Docs.summary: Returns detailed information about the pitch, speaking rate, and volume of speech output.
Docs.value: 返回 的有效实例，它包含语音输出的语调、语速、音量设置以及对这些设置的更改。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的信息<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody>对应于`<prosody>`SSML 规范中的 XML 标记

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SayAs As SayAs

Docs.summary: Returns information about the context for the generation of speech from text..
Docs.value: 如果语音合成引擎所用的 SSML 包含有关用于生成语音的上下文的详细信息，则返回一个值 的实例；否则返回 。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 返回的信息<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A>对应于`<say-as>`标记和 SSML 规范中，并可在其特性指定：
- 内容类型 （如货币、 日期或地址） 或由表示的语言构造<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A>属性<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>。
- 格式设置信息来处理所表示的内容类型的可选<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A>属性<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>，例如，日期语法。
- 详细信息，用于生成语音从<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A>属性<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>，例如，是否显式呈现标点。
